data.message: Religion is the source of all evil in the world, not two people loving each other. Please do the world a favour and delete your Facebook pages, as a matter of fact, delete anything you have with a gay tie-in. You'd be pretty surprised as how many websites are gay friendly. The internet doesn't need you and neither does the rest of the world. Soon you will be the ones that everyone laughs at.

replies.message: laugh? are you kidding? WE will be the ones you respect! why does everyone hate, then say not to hate? you all are messed up!
'you are all messed up?' How does that one guy represent all gay people?
